name: Bag of Holding (Thoof)
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #33: YOU AREN'T THE HERO

Help the hero level up by feeding him items from inside of his bag.

Reach level 10 and defeat the boss!

There is currently an issue where the game crashes. I believe it's only on the web version. Will be looking into it soon.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move & push items around
  • Any key to skip/progress text
  • Mouseover items to view their stats

Sourced audio (CC0, on opengameart.org):

  • Title music: "Medieval: Minstrel Dance" by RandomMind
  • Game music: "Medieval: The Old Tower Inn" by RandomMind
  • "RPG sound pack" by artisticdude
  • "512 Sound Effects (8-bit style) by Subspace Audio
  • Various sfx packs by Rubberduck

All art/code by me. @Thoof4 on Twitter, @thoof_dev on Instagram
